## Introduction

Quarto is a modern, open-source publishing system that combines the power of R, Python, and Markdown to create dynamic documents, reports, presentations, and websites.
It turns source code, text, and visuals into polished, shareable outputs.
It is designed for seamless collaboration and reproducibility, making it an ideal tool for knowledge sharing amongst IDM data scientists, researchers, and developers.
